blogPost.excerpt: Nerdy Image Downloader is a tool for downloading images in bulk/batches. Download images from Pinterest boards. This tool automatically scrolls for you to collect all images and downloads them into a zip folder.
blogPost.body: Nerdy Image Downloader is a tool for downloading images in bulk/batches. Download images from Pinterest boards. This tool automatically scrolls for you to collect all images and downloads them into a zip folder.
blogPost.title: Nerdy Image Downloader - Downloads images from Pinterest board to zip
blogPost.author: Tanjum 🔥

localize.description: 呆萌图片下载器是一款批量/批次下载图片的工具。从Pinterest板块下载图片。这款工具可以自动滚动为你收集所有图片，并将它们下载到一个zip文件夹中。
localize.tagline: 从Pinterest板块下载图片到压缩包

localize.description: 呆萌圖片下載器是一款批量/批次下載圖片的工具。從Pinterest板塊下載圖片。這款工具可以自動滾動爲你收集所有圖片，並將它們下載到一個zip文件夾中。
localize.tagline: 從Pinterest板塊下載圖片到壓縮包
